snippet: Linda E. McMahon, the former professional wrestling executive and Republican donor who recently hosted an event for Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, is not yet prepared to say she has aligned with him in the 2016 presidential sweepstakes.
abstract: Linda E. McMahon, the former professional wrestling executive and Republican donor who recently hosted an event for Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, is not yet prepared to say she has aligned with him in the 2016 presidential sweepstakes.

headline.main: Linda McMahon Co-Hosts Christie Event, but Withholds Full Support — for Now
